question_text:
Question 4
In given table
Subnet – 1D 
Mask 
Interface
12.20.168.0 
255.255.254.0 
0
I
12.20.166.0 
255.255.254.0 
1
I
12.20.164.0 
255.255.255.252 
1
R
12.20.170.0 
255.255.254.0 
2
R
(default) 
 
3
R
The route aggregation is applied over above table what will be the subnet – ID/mask in aggregated router?

GATE 2022 
 [Forenoon Session]
Computer Science Engineering
PAGE
3

(A) 12.20.164.0/20 (B) 12.20.164.0/21
(C) 12.20.168.0/22 (D) 12.20.164.0/22
explanation_text:
Sol.
(A) 12.20.1010 0100.00000000, here the network address is 12.20.1010 0100.00000000 and this
network covers all the required IP addresses and hence the required answer.
(B) 12.20.10100 100.00000000, here the network address is 12.20.10100 100.00000000, but this
network does not have IP address 12.20.170.0, hence this cannot be the answer.
(C) 12.20.101010 00.00000000, here in this network address we do not have IP address 12.20.164.0,
hence this cannot be the answer.
(D) 12.20.101001 00.00000000, here in this network we do not have IP address 12.20.170.0, hence this
cannot be the answer.
So, 12.20.164.0/20 will be the network – ID of aggregated route.
Q.5 
Consider an enterprise network with two Ethernet segments, a web server and a firewall, connected via 
three routers shown below:-
Router 1
Firewall
Web server
Router 2
Router 3
Ethernet 1
Ethernet 2
C1
C2
Cn
C1
C2
Cn
What is the number of subnets in the enterprise network?
(A) 8 
(B) 6
(C) 3 
(D) 12
Sol. 
This is just like non equal sub netting where router 2 has the half of the addresses, Router 1 has other half, 
which is further divided into two subnets which is Web server and router 3, So total of 3 subnets possible.
Q.6
 
Consider a resolution of domain name www.gate.org.in by a DNS resolver. Assume that no records are 
called anywhere across the DNS servers and the iterative query resolution mechanism is used in the

GATE 2022 
 [Forenoon Session]
Computer Science Engineering
PAGE
4

resolution. The number of DNS query response pairs involved in completely resolving the domain name 
is ____. 
 
 
[2 Marks, NAT
]
Sol.
 
In the iterative query the DNS resolver go to the these three servers which is root server, TLD DNS server, 
authoritative server. So there will be three pairs of request and response here.
Compiler Design
